text: The Bagmati River is a river in Bagmati Zone of Nepal. It is a holy river for both Hindus and Buddhists. This river flows through Kathmandu valley. Many temples can be seen in the bank of this river. Pashupatinath temple is also at the bank of this river. Due to large population of the cities this river is very polluted. A report about Bagmati in The Himalayan timesA Bagmati river improvement program by Nepal government ==References== Category:Rivers of Nepal Category:Rivers of Bihar
title: Bagmati River
